FriendGreet_03:
So I'm gonna share the love here and tell
you the <clr:0000>secret treasure info <clr:ffff>I've got!
GoalPoint_01:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal>I can't say this too loudly,<sp:5:0:0> but I heard that <clr:0000>Misko's
treasure<clr:ffff> is hidden in <clr:0000>Lake Kilsie Cave inside this
mountain pass<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:1:0>
A Rito told me that you can only get into that cave
from the <clr:0000>north side<clr:ffff> of the lake too.

<sp:3:0:2:0a00><sp:0:2:2:6400>But those pickings aren't as easy as you'd
hope. <sp:5:1:0>There's not so much as an animal
trail to <clr:0000>Lake Kilsie<clr:ffff>, let alone a road.
To top it all off, the lake's surrounded
by steep precipices. Let me tell ya,
precipices? Not fashion-friendly.<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0801>But giving up would mean falling out of
style...<sp:5:0:0>and that's something I'll never do!
GoRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000><snd:QuestionNormal><clr:ffff>Do you know <clr:0000>Lake Kilsie<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0>It's past <clr:0000>Dronoc's Pass up north<clr:ffff>. I was
just heading there myself, because, uh...<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Someone told me a piece of <clr:0000>Misko's treasure <clr:ffff>is
hidden in <clr:0000>Lake Kilsie Cave<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000>Better yet, they say it was Misko's<clr:0000> favorite clothing
to wear when traveling in freezing climes<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
GoRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'd never say a word against clothes
this chic. <sp:5:1:0>But between you and me...<sp:5:1:0>
this outfit is really cold.
My wardrobe is practically crying out for
Misko's <clr:0000>favorite cold-weather clothes<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0900>The only way to stop this shivering is to
go to <clr:0000>Lake Kilsie Cave<clr:ffff> and claim that
iconic garb for myself.
The cave's tucked away in <clr:0000>Dronoc's Pass<clr:ffff>
up <clr:0000>north<clr:ffff>, surrounded by steep cliffs.<sp:0:4:0>But if I think about the obstacles, I'll stop
moving. And if I stop moving, I'll freeze!
BackRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Up <clr:0000>northwest <clr:ffff>at <clr:0000>Lake Kilsie<clr:ffff>, <clr:0000>there's a
cave <clr:ffff>that holds an amazing treasure...<sp:0:4:0>a piece of clothing that once belonged to
the inventor of fashion—<clr:0000><sp:5:0:0>Misko <clr:ffff>the bandit!<sp:0:4:0>I know roughly where it is—on the <clr:0000>north
side<clr:ffff> of the lake—but I can't figure out
how to get there.
<sp:5:0:0>There's not a road to be seen around
those parts.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>Just imagine the toll roughing it would
take on my clothes...<sp:0:4:0>Hm, yeah, I'm not doing this without a
plan. Maybe the <clr:0000>newspaper company<clr:ffff>
could help me figure one out.
StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>According to fashion legend, the famous
bandit <clr:0000>Misko<clr:ffff> had a signature outfit <clr:0000>for
adventuring in freezing climes<clr:ffff>.
The rumors say the whole look is hidden
right here in <clr:0000>Hebra<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Just between us, I hear that one piece of the outfit
is in <clr:0000>Lake Kilsie Cave <clr:ffff>to the <clr:0000>northwest<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>I SWEAR, if you get there before me,
I'll... I'll...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>Nah, I'm just kiddin', superstar.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>It's treasure. <sp:5:0:0>The finders-keepers rule is
in full effect. No hard feelings, either way!
StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The iconic bandit <clr:0000>Misko<clr:ffff>'s winter look is
supposed to be hidden in <clr:0000>Hebra<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01>And one piece in specific is said to be in <clr:0000>Lake Kilsie
Cave <clr:ffff>to the <clr:0000>northwest<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>No matter who finds it, though, no hard
feelings! <sp:5:1:0>That's just how treasure goes.
Yiga_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>It's not just the armor you've taken a
shine to, but the whole Yiga getup!<sp:0:4:0>I know this sounds weird because of the
kidnapping and all, but seein' you wearing
armor I tailored...<sp:5:1:0>makes me sorta proud.
BackRange_01:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal>I can't say this too loudly, but I heard that a piece of
<clr:0000>Misko's treasure<clr:ffff> is hidden in <clr:0000>Lake Kilsie Cave inside
this very mountain<clr:ffff>.
Heads up though. A Rito told me that the cave is on
the <clr:0000>north side<clr:ffff> of the lake.<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>Even knowing that...<sp:5:1:0>there are no roads
leading to<clr:0000> Lake Kilsie<clr:ffff>. Not so much as a
single animal trail.
It's also surrounded on all sides by steep
precipices... I shudder for these stylish
threads just thinking about it.
Maybe I should stop by the <clr:0000>newspaper
company<clr:ffff> to get some more info and prep
myself for the journey.
BackRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Legendary clothing from <clr:0000>Misko's<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>icy-clime
adventure collection<clr:ffff> is supposed to be
hidden right here in <clr:0000>Hebra<clr:ffff>!
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01>I can't say this too loudly, but I heard one of the
pieces is in <clr:0000>Lake Kilsie Cave <clr:ffff>to the <clr:0000>northwest<clr:ffff>...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Near_GoRange_02: I can reach it. I know I can!
Near_BackRange_02: Why did I eat it all?
GoRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm makin' my way to <clr:0000>Lake Kilsie<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>It's <clr:0000>wayyy north<clr:ffff>, all the way up past
<clr:0000>Dronoc's Pass<clr:ffff>, so it's gonna take a while.<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01>But boy, will it all be worth it. I heard a piece of
<clr:0000>Misko's treasure<clr:ffff> is hidden in <clr:0000>Lake Kilsie Cave<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000>Plus, <sp:5:1:0>it's supposed to be Misko's<clr:0000> favorite clothing
for cold-weather adventuring<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
GoRange_01_3:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I've gotta get my hands on it!<sp:5:1:0> This is the
only fashionable outfit I have!
BackRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>They say the bandit <clr:0000>Misko<clr:ffff> hid some of
their legendary clothing in <clr:0000>Hebra<clr:ffff>...<sp:0:4:0>Those clothes are supposed to a big help
for adventuring in the biting cold.<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01>They ALSO say that one of those pieces is hidden in
<clr:0000>Lake Kilsie Cave <clr:ffff>to the <clr:0000>northwest<clr:ffff>...<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:3:0:2:0701>Treasure is always finders keepers.<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:5:1:0>
Don't sweat it if you get there before
me, superstar!
BackRange_02_3:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I got a little problem here though... I, uh,
kinda ate all the food I whipped up for the
journey to <clr:0000>Lake Kilsie<clr:ffff>.
Misko didn't exactly choose a hiding
spot that was easily accessible for the
fashionably minded.<sp:0:4:0>Maybe I should swing by the newspaper
company to rest and stock up real quick.
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Some say that the legendary bandit <clr:0000>Misko<clr:ffff>
actually INVENTED fashion.<sp:0:4:0>And some of their very favorite clothes
are supposed to be hidden in <clr:0000>a cave at
Lake Kilsie<clr:ffff> to the <clr:0000>northwest<clr:ffff>!<sp:5:1:0>
I know that the cave is on the <clr:0000>north side<clr:ffff>
of the lake, but it isn't easy to get there.
No roads, no trails, not even a path!<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>But if I give up now...<sp:5:1:0>I might fall from
the cutting edge of fashion! If there's
no path, I'll just make my own!
RainPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey there, superstar!<sp:0:4:0>You're looking chic as ever. This weather
can't bring you down, huh?
FriendGreet_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Hey, hey! I thought I recognized you!
<sp:5:0:0>You're the superstar who got me out of
that jam with the Yiga Clan.
Oh, and how's the Yiga armor I tailored
treating you?<sp:5:0:0> That was rhetorical. I made
it, so I know it's perfect.
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>Seriously though. Thanks for setting me
free back there. I mean it.

Ever since, I've been running all over the
place, looking for <clr:0000>fashion treasures<clr:ffff> and
having the time of my life. Cheers for that!
Yiga:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>I know the Yiga Clan did sorta kidnap me
and force me to make that armor, but
seeing you wear it fills me with...pride?
Yeah. Yeah, pride! <sp:5:1:0>I'm proud to see you
making some good out of bad.
FriendGreet_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:TalkPositive>Well, well, well. You came back, superstar!<sp:0:4:0>That can only mean one thing—you wanna
know the secret to the treasure, huh?<sp:0:4:0>Well, you got it! <sp:5:0:0>You did kinda save me
from a lifetime of unappreciated labor...
FriendGreet_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Hey, hey! You made me double-take for
a sec there...<sp:5:0:0>but I could never forget the
superstar who helped me out!
And man, you're even rockin' that Yiga
armor I tailored!<sp:5:0:0> Super comfy, right?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>Seriously, though, thanks again for the
save back there. You are the GUY, guy.<sp:0:4:0>Thanks to you, instead of rotting in a cell,
I'm running around, searching for <clr:0000>stylish
treasure <clr:ffff>and having the time of my life.
